mapper.insert: insert into crm_invoice_info (invoice_info_id, customer_id, invoice_type_id, drawee_name, unified_social_credit_code, opening_bank, register_phone, bank_account_code, bank_account_name, register_address) values (#{invoiceInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{draweeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifiedSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openingBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select invoice_info_id, customer_id, invoice_type_id, drawee_name, unified_social_credit_code, opening_bank, register_phone, bank_account_code, bank_account_name, register_address from crm_invoice_info
